ranks.text: On 8/31 you'll unlock this cooperation through story progression.Unlocks the Moral Support ability, giving Futaba a chance to cast Kaja or other party-healing magic mid-battle.Unlocks the Akihabara location.

Requires rank 4 (selfless) kindness. The date must also be after 9/2.Impactful Conversation Choices for this Rank:Unlocks the Mementos Scan ability. With this, Futaba has a chance of fully mapping out a floor of Mementos on arrival.
choices: Choice 2: "If we work together." +3 / "Want me to help?" +2

ranks.text: Impactful conversation choices for this rank:
choices: Choice 1: "I was about to come find you." +3
Choice 2: "Good to see you again." +3 / "You're the one who appeared." +2

ranks.text: Impactful conversation choices for this rank:Unlocks the Position Hack skill - with this, Futaba can arrange for you to sometimes open a battle with a hold-up.
choices: Choice 3: "I think it's cute." +3 / "Everyone does it." +2 / "Not at all." +2

ranks.text: Impactful conversation choices for this rank:
Impactful conversation choices for this rank:Unlocks the Active Support ability. With this, Moral Support can sometimes charge and recover SP too.
choices: Choice 1: "That must have been a shock." +3  /  "Are you happy?" +2

ranks.text: Impactful conversation choices for this rank:Unlocks the Treasure Reboot ability.Unlocks the Daughter's Just a Meal Ticket sidequest / request for Mementos. This must be completed before the next rank can be started.
choices: Choice 1: "What horrible parents." +2 / "We have to put a stop to this." +2
Choice 2: "I'll do it, for you." +3 / "We'll show them the truth." +3 / "Give me some time." +2

ranks.text: To initiate, complete the Daughter's Just a Meal Ticket sidequest/request in mementos.Impactful conversation choices for this rank:
choices: Choice 1: "That's incredible." +3  /  "I'm glad to hear that." +3 / "Did you stutter at all?" +2
Choice 2: "You worked really hard, too." +3 / "You're making me blush..." +2

ranks.text: This is the point when a romance with Futaba Sakura becomes available.Impactful conversation choices for this rank:Romance - "Because I love you."Friendship - "Because we're teammates."Unlocks the Emergency Shift ability, giving Futaba the ability to potentially swap out some party members when two or more are KOed.
choices: Choice 1: "You've really matured." +3 / "What if you get bullied again?" +2
Choice 2: "Are you OK, Futaba?" +3 / "You're imagining things." +2

ranks.text: Any choices you make will be irrelevant, since this is the max rank.Unlocks Final Guard, which has a chance to completely nullify an otherwise fatal attack.Unlocks Second Awakening, evolving Futaba's Persona to its final form, Ongyo-Ki.
